title: What are these rankings?
text: This is the Extended Stats game rankings. One of the objectives of Extended Stats is to experiment with being different to BGG, and this page does indeed use a different ranking system. You can sort by BGG Ranking if that offends you.
If you have a good idea for another ranking, let me know and I can try to add it to this table.

title: Score
text: A game's score is simply all of the ratings Extended Stats users have given it, added up. People complain 'but that favours common games!' Well, yes, those games got common for a reason.

title: Ratings Count
text: How many Extended Stats users have rated the game.

title: Normalised Score
text: The normalised score is a score similar to the Extended Stats score - it is the normalised score from all of the users, added up. The normalised score for a user is the number (C - N) / C where C is the number of games the user has rated, and N is the number of games the user has rated strictly higher than this one. This method removes influence of people who just rate games 1 or 10.

title: Total Plays
text: Total plays of this game recorded by Extended Stats users.

title: H-index
text: The largest number h such that h players have played the game h times each.

title: G-index
text: The largest number g such that the g players who have played the game the most times have played the game on average g times each. This is similar to the h-index but favours games that some people play a lot.
